aws_credentials_profile_name.description: (required) references credentail groups in ~/.aws/credentials; used by our Makefiles, boto and aws cli.

environment.description: (required) used throughout to segregate remote storage and pick setting from map variables

vpc_dns_zone_name.description: (required) dns zone name associated with vpc_dns_zone_id

vpc_dns_zone_id.description: (required) route53 zone id where [01].nat.${vpc_dns_zone_name} A records get created.

tf_remote_state_s3_storage_bucket.description: terraform remote s3 backend bucket name
